channel.title: Announcing redash-python, A more complete Redash API python client
channel.description: we have been using redash in production for an automated pipeline, we wrote a lot of custom code to the point it was more lines compared to the redash_toolbelt client, thus we decided to turn it into a library for everyone to benefit! check the documentation below for more informations. https://www.blacksuan19.dev/redash-python/

item.title: Announcing redash-python, A more complete Redash API python client
item.dc:creator: Blacksuan19
item.description:
we have been using redash in production for an automated pipeline, we wrote a lot of custom code to the point it was more lines compared to the redash_toolbelt client, thus we decided to turn it into a library for everyone to benefit!
check the documentation below for more informations.

blacksuan19.dev

redash-python

A more complete Python library for Redash

item.source: Announcing redash-python, A more complete Redash API python client
